name: Atlantgis
classfromlabelquery: SELECT DISTINCT ?class { ?class <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> owl:Class . ?class rdfs:label ?label . FILTER(CONTAINS(?label,"%%label%%"))} LIMIT 100
subclassquery: SELECT DISTINCT ?subclass ?label WHERE { OPTIONAL { ?subclass rdfs:label ?label . } ?subclass rdfs:subClassOf %%concept%% . ?a <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> ?subclass . ?a ?rel ?a_geom . ?a_geom <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#asWKT> ?wkt . }
whattoenrichquery:
SELECT (COUNT(distinct ?con) AS ?countcon) (COUNT(?rel) AS ?countrel) ?rel ?valtype
 WHERE { ?con %%typeproperty%% %%concept%% . ?con ?rel ?val .
 BIND( datatype(?val) AS ?valtype ) }
  GROUP BY ?rel ?valtype
 ORDER BY DESC(?countrel)
geocollectionquery: SELECT DISTINCT ?colinstance ?label (count(distinct ?memb) as ?members)  WHERE { OPTIONAL {?colinstance rdfs:member ?memb . } ?colinstance <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> %%concept%% . OPTIONAL { ?colinstance rdfs:label ?label . } } GROUP BY ?colinstance ?label

Ogham Stones

whattoenrichquery:
SELECT (COUNT(distinct ?con) AS ?countcon) (COUNT(?rel) AS ?countrel) ?rel ?valtype
 WHERE { ?con wdt:P31 %%concept%% . ?con wdt:P625 ?coord . ?con ?rel ?val .
 BIND( datatype(?val) AS ?valtype ) } GROUP BY ?rel ?valtype
 ORDER BY DESC(?countrel)

name: LinkedGeoData
classfromlabelquery: SELECT DISTINCT ?class { ?class <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> owl:Class . ?class rdfs:label ?label . FILTER(CONTAINS(?label,"%%label%%"))} LIMIT 100
whattoenrichquery:
SELECT (COUNT(distinct ?con) AS ?countcon) (COUNT(?rel) AS ?countrel) ?rel ?valtype
 WHERE {
 ?con <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> %%concept%% .
 ?con <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat .
 ?con <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?lon .
 ?con ?rel ?val .
 BIND( datatype(?val) AS ?valtype )}
  GROUP BY ?rel ?valtype
 ORDER BY DESC(?countrel)

name: DBPedia
whattoenrichquery:
SELECT (COUNT(distinct ?con) AS ?countcon) (COUNT(?rel) AS ?countrel) ?rel ?valtype
 WHERE {
 ?con <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> %%concept%% .
 ?con <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat .
 ?con <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?lon .
 ?con ?rel ?val .
 BIND( datatype(?val) AS ?valtype )}
  GROUP BY ?rel ?valtype
 ORDER BY DESC(?countrel)
classfromlabelquery: SELECT DISTINCT ?class ?label WHERE { ?ind <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> ?class  . ?class rdfs:label ?label . FILTER (lang(?label) = '%%language%%') FILTER(CONTAINS(?label, "%%label%%")) } LIMIT 10

querytemplate.label: Random Places with Locations
Places with Forts
querytemplate.query:
SELECT ?item ?label ?geo WHERE {
 ?place a <%%concept%%>.
 ?place pleiades:hasLocation ?item .
 ?item geosparql:asWKT ?geo .
 ?item dcterms:title ?label .
 ?place pleiades:hasFeatureType placetype:fort.
 }

querytemplate.label: Places with Churches
querytemplate.query:
SELECT ?item ?label ?geo WHERE {
 ?place a <%%concept%%>.
 ?place pleiades:hasLocation ?item .
 ?item geosparql:asWKT ?geo .
 ?item dcterms:title ?label .
 ?place pleiades:hasFeatureType placetype:church.
 }

querytemplate.label: Places in Roman Period
querytemplate.query:
SELECT ?item ?label ?geo WHERE {
 ?place a <%%concept%%>.
 ?place pleiades:hasLocation ?item .
 ?item geosparql:asWKT ?geo .
 ?item dcterms:title ?label .
 ?item pleiades:during timeperiod:roman.
 }

querytemplate.label: Forts in Roman Period
querytemplate.query:
SELECT ?item ?label ?geo WHERE {
 ?place a <%%concept%%>.
 ?place pleiades:hasLocation ?item .
 ?item geosparql:asWKT ?geo .
 ?item dcterms:title ?label .
 ?item pleiades:during timeperiod:roman.
 ?place pleiades:hasFeatureType placetype:fort.
 }

querytemplate.label: 10 Random Geometries
Load Germany Federal States
Load World
Johns Hopkins Data 25/04/2020
querytemplate.query:
SELECT ?label ?confirmed ?recovered ?deaths ?geo WHERE { ?dataset a covid19:JHU_Dataset. 
 ?dataset covid19:country ?item. 
 ?dataset covid19:date '2020-04-25T00:00:00.000Z'. 
 ?dataset covid19:confirmed ?confirmed. 
 ?dataset covid19:recovered ?recovered. 
 ?dataset covid19:deaths ?deaths. 
 ?item <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#hasGeometry> ?item_geom . 
 ?item rdfs:label ?label. 
 ?item_geom geosparql:asWKT ?geo . 
 }
 ORDER BY ASC(?label)

querytemplate.label: 100 Random Geometries
querytemplate.query:
SELECT * WHERE {
 ?item a <%%concept%%>.
 ?item <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2015/1/EPNet-ONTOP_Ontology#hasLatitude> ?lat.
 ?item <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontologies/2015/1/EPNet-ONTOP_Ontology#hasLongitude> ?lon.
 ?item dcterms:title ?title .
 }
 ORDER BY ASC(?title)
 LIMIT 100
